alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 8:11AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Walton, Holmes and central Washington Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 710 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Geneva to 10 miles north of De Funiak Springs to 12 miles north of Eglin Air Force Base to 6 miles northeast of Crestview. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Chipley, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Rock Hill, Glendale, Holmes Valley and Millers Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington
